featured.text: To make fresh lemonade, cut the lemon in half, _____ the juice into a bowl, and then add as much water and sugar as you like. (A) decrease (B) squeeze (C) freeze (D) cease 12.

definition.zh_def: 使某物變成冰或固體，或使其保持在低溫狀態。
definition.en_def: To cause something to become solid or to remain at a low temperature, typically by lowering its temperature to below its freezing point.
definition.example: Please freeze the leftovers so we can eat them later.
